entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
